posts.post_title: SOLD: 1887-90 N172 Old Judge - Ed Delahanty HOF RC (SGC 60)
posts.post_content:
Good Afternoon, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a very scarce 1887-90 N172 Old Judge - Ed Delahanty HOF Rookie Card which has been graded an SGC 60 by the strict graders at Sportscard Guaranty Company, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scan of the card for condition details, back is clean and blank. Sale price on this beauty is $No Longer For Sale dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url] Due to the high dollar value of this card, payment will be accepted via money order or cashier's check only.
